or C++ they have to be built with a compatible compiler set as what you built the The Interpreter with otherwise
you Segal right and then every subsequent package that has C dependencies needs to be built with the
same compiler set otherwise you end up with runtime seg vaults which is's no fun for anybody so we basically have
created a normalized build system it's like a Lego ground base plate that has equal spaced studs and is level and then
you can put everything on it but you need that first base plate so that's what the Anaconda runtime really is so it's a python interpreter that we've

and the cond package manager or um you can get Anaconda which comes with like
250 or something 320 packages pre-built as well so pre-populated base plate but
